ATTENTION!!
For change the gane language, follow these steps:

1-In the ISO file, go to the CRACK folder and open the steam_rld.ini file with the notepad.

2-Go to the end and change the Language=english line to your language (English, German, French, Italian, Spanish or Japanese). For example: Language=spanish

3-Save the file to desktop and copy the desktop file to the Win32 folder (C:Program Files (x86)DMC Devi May CryBinariesWin32)

4-Finally, copy the crack file (steam_api.dll)

5-Enjoy DmC with your language.

PD: extremezone, in the future uploads, you can post this information for newbies like me. Thanks.

ATTENTION!!!

For change the game language, follow this steps:

1-Go to the crack folder within the ISO file.

2-Open the steam_rld.ini file with the notepad.

3-Edit the following line "Language=english" to your language. Example: Language=spanish.
(Languages available: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Japanese)

4-Save the file to the desktop and copy it in the game folder with the crack file steam_api.dll. (C:Program Files (x86)DMC Devi May CryBinariesWin32)

5- Overwrite and ENJOY YOUR LANGUAGE IN THIS GAME!!

PD: extremezone, i hope in your future uploads you put the language instructions for the newbies like me :)

Read this fix on a website for "CAPCOM Title Crash." Worked for me!!:

For everyone who is using Razer “Nostromo”. You keep crashing after CAMCOM logo right? Basicly you don’t need to unplug nostromo or uninstall it’s drivers, all you gotta do is to go to:
Start Menu -> Search -> Device Manager -> Human Interfaces -> Razer Nostromo -> Double click it and disable driver. If you disable nostromo driver you can play without unpluging or unisntalling anything. I hope it helps.

where is located the saves directory?
I also want to know the save location. I've looked in Documents, install directory, and AppData (local & roaming).

Sorry for double-posting, but I have found the save file location:

C:ProgramDataSteam[UserName]220440storage

There should be 3 files:
DMC5_SAVE_00_CHECKPNT
DMC5_SAVE_00_INFO
DMC5_SAVE_00_PROFILE

Hope this helps some people out!

No slashes allowed apparently...

C:_ProgramData_Steam_[UserName]_220440_storage

Just change the underscores to slashes.

Oke so I found a Solution for the ppl with a PS3 controller and Motionjoy that got stuck on the "capcom screen 'has stopped working'"

1) be sure to use the xbox360 settings in motionjoy (even if u have the ps3 controller)

2) go to Device and Printers

3) open HID-compliant game controllers properties

4) go to Hardware open HID-compliant game controller

5) go to driver > disable it

6) open up the game and play

Atleast this worked for me

Is there a solution to the Vergil's health resetting glitch, yet? Every time I get his health down to the point where one more hit should kill him, it resets all the way to full. Please help. I'm on Devil Hunter if that's relevant.

Up until that, this torrent worked perfectly for me all the way through, downloaded in 1:25hr and installed without incident. During play, it never crashed or anything. 

If you want to use a PS3 controller, run  MotionInJoy as administrator and have it emulate an Xbox360 controller. The sensitivity, vibration, and buttons should all work and be configured correctly already without needing any change. If you don't run MotionInJoy as administrator, the driver for the controller sometimes stops working in the middle of the game, in which case you just need to alt-tab out and re-enable it, and you should regain use of the controller without having to end the game.

Well, the health glitch is fixed with the Skidrow Update Cracked, which appears to be perfectly compatible with this version of the game. Someone posted the changelog for what else comes with the update under that torrent, which should pop up closer to the top if you searched "DMC Devil May Cry".
